title: Revolution Part 8 - Justice & Politics
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
overview: Analysis of Justice as concept, FBI COINTELPRO operations, court system failures, and CIA guerrilla warfare psychology

justice_concept.definition: Amorphous God - a belief that things ought to turn out a certain way
justice_concept.symbolism: Blind woman holding sword and scale, benches of Judges
justice_concept.government_claim: Governments offer this amorphous God and demand trust in flawed systems
justice_concept.revolutionary_trigger: When scales tip toward Government, there is protest, revolt, Revolution
justice_concept.key_question: Does Justice belong to any Government?

court_system_analysis.quote: Even the most dedicated trial judges are bound to overlook meritorious cases without the benefit of an adversary presentation
court_system_analysis.purpose: Part of why Public Defenders exist

cases_won: 2 cases about Driving on wrong side of road

observed_reality.99_percent: Trial Waived - people give up their rights
observed_reality.remaining_1_percent: 75%+ determined by lawyer's history/skill at procedural talk
observed_reality.final_25_percent: May present case law, usually determined by technicalities (witnesses showing up)
observed_reality.case_law_presented: Maybe 0.5% of cases have single piece of Case Law presented

cia_guerrilla_warfare_psychology.source: CIA - Psychological Operations in Guerilla Warfare
cia_guerrilla_warfare_psychology.core_concept: Guerrilla warfare is essentially a political war
cia_guerrilla_warfare_psychology.battlefield: Penetrates the political entity itself - the 'political animal' of Aristotle
cia_guerrilla_warfare_psychology.environment: Born and grows in political environment - constant combat to dominate political mentality
cia_guerrilla_warfare_psychology.victory_or_failure: Defined in collective psychological space, not territorial limits

recruitment_strategy.pressure: When clandestine involvement revealed, psychological pressure makes them 'inside cadres'

mass_control.shouters: Slogan shouters under outside commando control

psychological_manipulation.goal: Prepare mental attitude for justified violence at crucial moment

whiplash_effect.definition: Ability to shake up existing structure when order for fusion given
whiplash_effect.requirement: Infiltration and internal subjective control developed parallel to guerrilla activities
whiplash_effect.result: Commandant can shake up structure and replace it

parallel_warfare.principle: Psychological activities simultaneous with military ones

quiz_questions.q: What happened to Fred Hampton according to Hanrahan v. Hampton?
quiz_questions.a: FBI and Chicago DA assassinated him in his bed, claimed gun fight, took 20 years to reveal truth
quiz_questions.explanation: FBI planted bodyguards to facilitate the raid

quiz_questions.q: According to @marsresident's court observations, how many cases present case law?
quiz_questions.a: Maybe 0.5% - 99% waive trial, most of remainder determined by lawyer skill/technicalities
quiz_questions.explanation: Bounds v. Smith explains why adversary presentation matters

quiz_questions.q: What does the CIA document say about guerrilla warfare?
quiz_questions.a: It is essentially a POLITICAL war - victory defined in psychological space, not territory
quiz_questions.explanation: Penetrates the 'political animal' that Aristotle defined

quiz_questions.q: How many agitators does it take to create a large demonstration?
quiz_questions.a: 200-300 agitators can create demonstration of 10,000-20,000 people

quiz_questions.q: What is the 'whiplash effect' in guerrilla warfare?
quiz_questions.a: Ability to shake up and replace existing structure when fusion order is given
quiz_questions.explanation: Requires parallel development of infiltration and internal control
